title: Dokotoo Womens High Waisted Wide Leg Cargo Pants Baggy Casual Trendy Work Pants with 4 Pockets
description: Made from lightweight material, these pants feature subtle pleat details that add a touch of elegance to your look.
The high waist and belt loops create a flattering silhouette, while the hidden zip fly with button closure ensures a secure fit.
Functional pockets: The classic pockets with side flap pockets provide ample storage space for your essentials, making these pants practical for everyday wear.

Versatile silhouette: Our relaxed pants silhouette ends in straight ankle-length hemlines, making them versatile enough to pair with any type of shoe, from heels to sneakers. These pants are a must-have in any fashion-forward woman's wardrobe.
Size: S=US 4-6,M=US 8-10,L=US 12-14,XL=US 16-18. Check more info of this Pants in Size Chart and Product Description. Please choose carefully according to your size.
